53353.en: <voice 00420_00053353><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>What the? That light just now...<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53353.ja: <voice 00420_00053353><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>「なんだ？　今の光は……。<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53353.ko: <voice 00420_00053353><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>: 방금 그 빛은 뭐지……?<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53353.zh-Hans: <voice 00420_00053353><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>刚才的光是怎么回事？<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53353.zh-Hant: <voice 00420_00053353><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>是什麼？剛才那道光……<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53354.zh-Hans: <voice 00660_00053354><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>公主……殿下？！<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53354.zh-Hant: <voice 00660_00053354><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>公主……殿下！？<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53355.en: <voice 00880_00053355><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I have returned home.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53355.ja: <voice 00880_00053355><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ただいま　戻りました。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53355.ko: <voice 00880_00053355><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 지금 막 돌아왔습니다.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53355.zh-Hans: <voice 00880_00053355><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我回来了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53355.zh-Hant: <voice 00880_00053355><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我回來了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53356.en: <voice 01030_00053356><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>P-PRINCESS!! Ooo... Wha-what in the world...<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53356.ja:
<voice 01030_00053356><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>「姫さま！！
　おおぉ……　な　なんということだ……。<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53356.ko:
<voice 01030_00053356><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>: 공주님!!
　오오…… 이, 이게 무슨 일이란 말인가…….<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53356.zh-Hans:
<voice 01030_00053356><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>公主殿下！
哦……这是怎么一回事……<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53356.zh-Hant:
<voice 01030_00053356><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>公主！！
天啊……發、發生了什麼事……<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53357.en:
<voice 01125_00053357><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>THIS IS SERIOUS! THE PRINCESS!
PRINCESS ANLUCIA HAS RETURNED!!<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53357.ja:
<voice 01125_00053357><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>「大変だ！　姫さまが！　アンルシア姫さまが
　お戻りになられたぞーっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53357.ko:
<voice 01125_00053357><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>: 큰일이야! 공주님께서!
　안루시아 공주님께서 돌아오셨어!!<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53357.zh-Hans:
<voice 01125_00053357><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>来人啊！公主殿下！
安露西雅公主殿下回来了！<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53357.zh-Hant:
<voice 01125_00053357><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>不得了了！
公主！安露西亞公主回來了！！<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53358.en:
<voice 01435_00053358><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...Hahah. It seems we managed to cross over into the
true world successfully.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53358.ja:
<voice 01435_00053358><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「……ふふっ。
　どうやら　ちゃんと　真の世界に
　到着できたようですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53358.ko:
<voice 01435_00053358><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: ……후후.
　보아하니 무사히 진짜 세계에
　도착한 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53358.zh-Hans:
<voice 01435_00053358><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……呵呵
看来我们的确是
回到了真实世界。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53358.zh-Hant:
<voice 01435_00053358><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……呵呵，
看來我們的確回到了真實世界。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53359.en:
<voice 01525_00053359><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Yes. This is the castle where I was born and raised.
This is unmistakably True Gran Zedora.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53359.ja:
<voice 01525_00053359><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「はい。この城こそが　私が生まれ育った場所。
　真のグランゼドーラに　間違いありません。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53359.ko:
<voice 01525_00053359><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 네, 이 성이야말로 제가 나고 자란 곳.
　진짜 그랑제도라가 분명해요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53359.zh-Hans:
<voice 01525_00053359><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>是的。这个城堡就是我出生长大的地方。
这里就是真正的古兰泽朵拉。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53359.zh-Hant:
<voice 01525_00053359><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>沒錯，這座城堡就是我從小長大的地方。
是真古蘭澤朵拉沒錯。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53360.ja: <voice 01865_00053360><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>「ア…　アンルシア……！<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53360.ko: <voice 01865_00053360><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>: 아… 안루시아……!<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53360.zh-Hans: <voice 01865_00053360><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>安……安露西雅！<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53360.zh-Hant: <voice 01865_00053360><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>安、安露西亞……！<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53361.en:
<voice 02130_00053361><start_lip_sync n02087 _normal m00001>Aah... Is it really you...? Thank goodness... Thank
goodness you are all right...<stop_lip_animation n02087 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53361.ja:
<voice 02130_00053361><start_lip_sync n02087 _normal m00001>「ああ……　本当に　あなたなの？
　よかった……。よく　無事で…………。<stop_lip_animation n02087 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53361.ko:
<voice 02130_00053361><start_lip_sync n02087 _normal m00001>: 아아…… 정말 안루시아 너니?
　다행이다……. 용케 무사히………….<stop_lip_animation n02087 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53361.zh-Hans:
<voice 02130_00053361><start_lip_sync n02087 _normal m00001>啊……真的是你吗？
太好了……你没事……<stop_lip_animation n02087 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53361.zh-Hant:
<voice 02130_00053361><start_lip_sync n02087 _normal m00001>啊啊……真的是妳嗎？
太好了……妳沒事真是太好了……<stop_lip_animation n02087 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53362.en:
<voice 02350_00053362><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I'm sorry for worrying you. But it was because of
that... I was able to come back home alive.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53362.ja:
<voice 02350_00053362><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「心配かけて　ごめんなさい。
　でも　こうして……
　生きて帰ってくることができました。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53362.ko:
<voice 02350_00053362><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 걱정 끼쳐서 죄송해요.
　하지만 이렇게……
　무사히 돌아왔어요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53362.zh-Hans:
<voice 02350_00053362><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>让你们担心了，真对不起。
但是我……
像现在这样活着回来了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53362.zh-Hant:
<voice 02350_00053362><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>讓你們擔心了，對不起。
不過……
我好好活著回來了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53363.en: <voice 02486_00053363><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>The Princess has returned, is it true?<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53363.ja: <voice 02486_00053363><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「姫が帰還したとは　まことか？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53363.ko: <voice 02486_00053363><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 공주가 돌아왔다는 게 사실인가?<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53363.zh-Hans: <voice 02486_00053363><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>公主回来了，是真的吗？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53363.zh-Hant: <voice 02486_00053363><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>聽說公主回來了，是真的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53365.en: <voice 02815_00053365><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>What is it, Lady Lushenda?<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53365.ja: <voice 02815_00053365><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>「いかがなされた　ルシェンダどの？<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53365.ko: <voice 02815_00053365><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>: 왜 그러시오, 루셴다 공?<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53365.zh-Hans: <voice 02815_00053365><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>怎么了，露谢妲阁下？<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53365.zh-Hant: <voice 02815_00053365><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>如何，露仙妲大人？<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53366.en:
<voice 02985_00053366><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Ever since she went missing during the battle with
the Demon King's army, how much has she been
through...<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53366.ja:
<voice 02985_00053366><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「魔王軍とのいくさで　行方知れずになって以来
　どれほどの体験をなさったのか……。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53366.ko:
<voice 02985_00053366><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 마왕군과의 전투에서 실종되신 뒤로
　어떤 모진 일을 겪으신 건지…….<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53366.zh-Hans:
<voice 02985_00053366><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>你在与魔王军的战斗中失踪以后，
究竟经历了什么……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53366.zh-Hant:
<voice 02985_00053366><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>和魔王軍一戰後便下落不明，
不知道她經歷了些什麼……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53367.ja: <voice 03040_00053367><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>「ルシェンダどの……？<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53367.ko: <voice 03040_00053367><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>: 루셴다 공……?<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53367.zh-Hans: <voice 03040_00053367><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>露谢妲阁下？<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53367.zh-Hant: <voice 03040_00053367><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>露仙妲大人……？<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53368.en: <voice 03195_00053368><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>King Arios, you'd best listen carefully.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53368.ja: <voice 03195_00053368><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「アリオス王。心して　聞かれるがよい。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53368.ko: <voice 03195_00053368><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 아리오스 왕, 잘 들으시오.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53368.zh-Hans: <voice 03195_00053368><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>亚里奥斯王。你用心听好。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53368.zh-Hant: <voice 03195_00053368><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>亞歷歐斯王，請注意聽我說。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53369.en: <voice 03235_00053369><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>...This Princess Anlucia is not the one we once knew.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53369.ja:
<voice 03235_00053369><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「……こちらの　アンルシア姫は
　我らが　よく知る　かつての姫ではない。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53369.ko:
<voice 03235_00053369><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: ……여기 있는 안루시아 공주는
　우리가 알던 예전의 안루시아 공주가 아니오.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53369.zh-Hans:
<voice 03235_00053369><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……站在这里的安露西雅公主
并不是我们熟知的过去的那个公主了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53369.zh-Hant:
<voice 03235_00053369><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>……這位安露西亞公主，
並非從前我等所熟知的那位公主。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53370.en:
<voice 03415_00053370><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>She has awakened... Awakened as a Hero, as the
Hero Princess Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53370.ja:
<voice 03415_00053370><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「覚醒を迎え……　勇者として目覚めた
　勇者姫アンルシアどのだ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53370.ko:
<voice 03415_00053370><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 각성해…… 용사로 거듭난
　용사 공주 안루시아다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53370.zh-Hans:
<voice 03415_00053370><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>她觉醒了……现在她是已经作为勇者
觉醒了的勇者公主安露西雅殿下。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53370.zh-Hant:
<voice 03415_00053370><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>她是覺醒成為勇者的，
勇者公主安露西亞。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53372.en:
<voice 03710_00053372><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>I-I see... If Toma, in the Kingdom of Heaven, could
see such a thing he would surely be delighted, I am
certain...<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53372.ja:
<voice 03710_00053372><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>「そ…　そうか……。
　天国のトーマも　このことを知れば
　さぞや　よろこんだであろうな……。<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53372.ko:
<voice 03710_00053372><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>: 그… 그렇군…….
　천국에 있는 토마도 이 사실을 알면
　무척이나 기뻐할 거다…….<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53372.zh-Hans:
<voice 03710_00053372><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>这……这样啊……
托玛在天堂里知道了这件事
也一定会高兴的……<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53372.zh-Hant:
<voice 03710_00053372><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>是、是嗎……
天國的托瑪要是知道了，
一定也會很開心吧……<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53425.en:
<voice 03905_00053425><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>Come now, let us not be this way! At once, prepare
a banquet! And impart to everyone that the Princess'
return and Awakening calls for grand celebration!!<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53425.ja:
<voice 03905_00053425><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>「さあ　こうしては　おられん！
　すぐに　宴の準備じゃ！　このことを　皆に伝え
　姫の帰還と覚醒を　盛大に祝おうぞ！！<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53425.ko:
<voice 03905_00053425><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>: 이러고 있을 때가 아니다!
　당장 연회 준비를 해라! 이 사실을 널리 알리고
　공주의 귀환과 각성을 성대히 축하하지!!<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53425.zh-Hans:
<voice 03905_00053425><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>不能一直站在这里说话！
快准备宴会！通知所有人，
要隆重庆祝公主的归来和觉醒！<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53425.zh-Hant:
<voice 03905_00053425><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>不能繼續浪費時間了！
快準備宴會吧！告訴大家公主歸國和覺醒的好消息，
盛大慶祝一番吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53374.en:
<center>News of Princess Anlucia's awakening as the Hero
spread throughout the country in a single night.
53374.ja:
<center>アンルシア姫が　勇者として
覚醒を迎えたという報せは
一夜にして　国中を　駆けめぐった。
53374.ko:
<center>안루시아 공주가 용사로
각성했다는 소식은
하룻밤 사이에 온 나라로 퍼졌다.
53374.zh-Hans:
<center>安露西雅公主作为勇者觉醒的消息
一夜间传遍了整个国家。
53374.zh-Hant:
<center>安露西亞公主
覺醒為勇者的消息，
在一個晚上便傳遍了全國。

53375.en:
<center>The people, grief-stricken by Prince Toma's death
and Anlucia's disappearance, heartily celebrated
the return of the Princess and newly-Awakened Hero.
53375.ja:
<center>トーマ王子の死と　アンルシア姫の消失に
ふさぎ込んでいた人々は　心から姫の帰還を祝い
新たな勇者の目覚めに　わき返った。
53375.ko:
<center>토마 왕자의 죽음과 안루시아 공주의 실종에
실의에 빠졌던 사람들은 공주의 귀환을 진심으로
기뻐하며 새로운 용사의 각성에 열광했다.
53375.zh-Hans:
<center>原本因为托玛王子的死和安露西雅公主的失踪
而愁眉不展的人们，由衷欢庆公主的归来，
因新勇者的觉醒而沸腾。
53375.zh-Hant:
<center>因托瑪王子之死和安露西亞公主失蹤
而憂鬱的人們，都打從心底祝福公主歸國，
並因新勇者的覺醒而歡騰。

53376.en:
<center>Some sang, some danced; people were
boisterous and overcome with much joy...
53376.ja:
<center>ある者は歌い　ある者は踊り
人々は　大いに騒いで　歓喜に酔いしれた……。
53376.ko:
<center>누군가는 노래하고, 누군가는 춤추며
모두가 떠들썩하게 기쁨에 취했다…….
53376.zh-Hans:
<center>有人唱歌，有人跳舞，
人们尽情庆祝，沉醉在欢乐中……
53376.zh-Hant:
<center>有的人唱歌，有的人跳舞，
人們鬧成一團，沉浸在喜悅之中……

53426.de: <center>Und so bricht ein neuer Tag an!

53378.en:
<voice 00100_00053378><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>Up to this point, you have done much to ensure the
safety of my daughter.<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53378.ja: <voice 00100_00053378><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>「このたびは　娘が　たいへん世話になった。<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53378.ko: <voice 00100_00053378><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>: 딸아이가 큰 신세를 졌군.<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53378.zh-Hans: <voice 00100_00053378><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>这次我的女儿真是得到了你不少帮助。<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53378.zh-Hant: <voice 00100_00053378><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>我女兒受你關照了。<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53379.en:
<voice 00130_00053379><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>For having safely brought back Anlucia from the likes
of that world, this 'False Lendersia', I simply cannot
thank you enough. As for what is to come...<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53379.ja:
<voice 00130_00053379><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>「偽りのレンダーシアなどという世界から
　アンルシアを　無事に連れ戻してくれたこと
　感謝してもしきれぬ。して　今後のことだが……<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53379.ko:
<voice 00130_00053379><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>: 가짜 렌더시아라는 곳에서
　안루시아를 무사히 데리고 와 주어
　정말로 고맙다. 헌데 앞으로의 일 말이네만……<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53379.zh-Hans:
<voice 00130_00053379><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>你从那个叫伪冷达西亚的世界
把安露西雅平安带了回来，
真是感激不尽。至于今后……<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53379.zh-Hant:
<voice 00130_00053379><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>我不知該如何感謝你，
從偽冷達西亞
把安露西亞平安帶回來。關於今後的事……<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53380.en: <voice 00191_00053380><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>King Arios, allow me to explain.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53380.ja:
<voice 00191_00053380><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「アリオス王よ。
　その話は　私からしよう。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53380.ko:
<voice 00191_00053380><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 아리오스 왕.
　그 이야기는 내가 하겠소.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53380.zh-Hans:
<voice 00191_00053380><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>亚里奥斯王。
后面的事由我来说吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53380.zh-Hant:
<voice 00191_00053380><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>亞歷歐斯王，
我來說吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53381.en:
<voice 00290_00053381><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>To create a another world similar but different than
this world... The Great Demon King Madesagora is
truly a fearsome being.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53381.ja:
<voice 00290_00053381><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「この世界と　似て非なる　もうひとつの世界を
　生みだすとは……　大魔王マデサゴーラは
　やはり　恐るべき存在だ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53381.ko:
<voice 00290_00053381><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 이 세계와 똑같은 가짜 세계를 하나 더
　만들어 내다니…… 역시
　대마왕 마데사고라는 위협적인 존재다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53381.zh-Hans:
<voice 00290_00053381><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>能制造出和这个世界相似
却又不同的另一个世界……
大魔王马蒂桑贡拉果然非常可怕。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53381.zh-Hant:
<voice 00290_00053381><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>竟然能創造一個與這世界似是而非的
另一個世界……
大魔王馬德沙葛拉果然不能小看。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53382.en:
<voice 00320_00053382><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>At first glance, it appears peaceful, but the Great
Demon King's evil influence certainly extends to this
world... I would like for you to search for it.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53382.ja:
<voice 00320_00053382><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「一見　平和そうに見える　この世界にも
　大魔王の魔の手は　確実に伸びている……。
　そなたには　それを探ってもらいたいのだ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53382.ko:
<voice 00320_00053382><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 언뜻 평화로워 보이는 이 세계에도
　분명히 대마왕의 마수가 뻗어 있을 테지…….
　그대가 그걸 찾아 주었으면 한다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53382.zh-Hans:
<voice 00320_00053382><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>这个世界看似和平，但大魔王的魔手
确实在影响整个世界……
我想拜托你去找到他的线索。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53382.zh-Hant:
<voice 00320_00053382><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>這個世界看起來和平，
但大魔王也已經開始伸出魔手……
我想請你去找那個異狀。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53383.en:
<voice 00360_00053383><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Since <pc> knows of the False World, they may
perceive strange phenomena that others would not.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53383.ja:
<voice 00360_00053383><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「偽りの世界を知る　<pc>なら
　他の者たちが　気づけぬ異変にも
　気づけるであろうからな。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53383.ko:
<voice 00360_00053383><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 가짜 세계를 아는 {pc}|hpp(이라,라)면
　다른 이들은 알아차리지 못하는 이변도
　알아차릴 수 있을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53383.zh-Hans:
<voice 00360_00053383><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>熟知虚假世界的<pc>你应该可以
看到其他人无法发觉的异变吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53383.zh-Hant:
<voice 00360_00053383><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>知曉虛偽世界的<pc>，
一定也能發現
其他人察覺不出的異變吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000618.en:
<voice 00390_29000618><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>How about it, <pc>? Will you travel together
with Princess Anlucia throughout Lendersia, in order
to investigate any strange phenomena occurring?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000618.ja:
<voice 00390_29000618><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「どうだ？　<pc>。アンルシア姫と共に
　このレンダーシアをめぐり　怪しい現象が
　起きておらぬか　調査してきてくれんか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000618.ko:
<voice 00390_29000618><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 어떤가? <pc>. 안루시아 공주와 함께
　이 렌더시아를 돌며 수상한 현상이
　일어나고 있진 않은지 조사해 주겠나?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000618.zh-Hans:
<voice 00390_29000618><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>怎么样？<pc>，你愿意和安露西雅公主
一起巡视冷达西亚，调查
有没有奇异现象发生吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000618.zh-Hant:
<voice 00390_29000618><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>怎麼樣？<pc>，你願意和安露西亞公主
一起巡視冷達西亞，調查
有沒有奇異現象發生嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53427.en: <voice 00460_00053427><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>I thank you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53427.ja: <voice 00460_00053427><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「感謝するぞ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53427.zh-Hans: <voice 00460_00053427><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>非常感谢，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53387.en:
<voice 00570_00053387><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>I shall leave you with this. It is called the Pendulum of
Fate. Those who hold it are guided to a singular
point in their destiny, it is said...<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53387.ja:
<voice 00570_00053387><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「これを　そなたに渡しておこう。
　運命の振り子と呼ばれるものでな。
　持つ者を　運命の特異点に導くという……。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53387.ko:
<voice 00570_00053387><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 이걸 그대에게 주지.
　운명의 진자라는 물건이다.
　소유자를 운명의 특이점으로 이끈다고 하지.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53387.zh-Hans:
<voice 00570_00053387><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>我把这个交给你。
这个叫命运钟摆，
能把持有者引向命运奇点。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53387.zh-Hant:
<voice 00570_00053387><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>這個給你。
這叫命運鐘擺，
它會指引持有者前往命運奇點……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000619.en:
<voice 00801_29000619><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Hmm, you say it would be careless to let the Princess
outside with it as being as dangerous as it is.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000619.ja:
<voice 00801_29000619><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「ふむ。姫を　うかつに外に出すのは
　危険だというのだな。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000619.ko:
<voice 00801_29000619><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 흠, 공주를 섣불리
　밖에 내보내서는 위험하단 말이지.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000619.zh-Hans:
<voice 00801_29000619><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯，轻率地让公主在外旅行，
确实是很危险。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000619.zh-Hant:
<voice 00801_29000619><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯，輕率地讓公主在外旅行，
確實是很危險。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000620.en:
<voice 00802_29000620><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>However, the Hero, for that very reason, was able to
come to be from the strange phenomena. While it is
peaceful, I would like to nip it in the bud.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000620.ja:
<voice 00802_29000620><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「だが　勇者だからこそ
　気づくことのできる　異変もあろう。
　平穏なうちに　その根を断ちたいのだ。　<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000620.ko:
<voice 00802_29000620><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 하지만 용사이기에
　알아차릴 수 있는 이변도 있을 터.
　아직 평온할 때 그 뿌리를 뽑고 싶다. <stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000620.zh-Hans:
<voice 00802_29000620><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>但有些异变，也只有
勇者才能够察觉到吧。
希望能趁还安稳的时候，斩草除根。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000620.zh-Hant:
<voice 00802_29000620><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>但有些異變也只有勇者才能夠察覺到吧。
希望能趁還安穩的時候，斬草除根。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000621.en:
<voice 00861_29000621><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>As you travel Lendersia, finding strange phenomena
and resolving any incidents, you'll find clues to the
Great Demon King's goal, I believe.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000621.ja:
<voice 00861_29000621><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「そなた達が　レンダーシアを旅して
　異変を見つけ　出会った事件を解決することは
　大魔王の狙いを探る　手がかりとなるだろう。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000621.ko:
<voice 00861_29000621><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 그대들이 렌더시아를 여행하며
　이변을 찾아 맞닥뜨린 사건을 해결하는 것이
　대마왕의 목적을 파악하는 실마리가 될 거다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000621.zh-Hans:
<voice 00861_29000621><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>你们去巡视冷达西亚，
找到异变，解决遇到的事件，
就可以发觉大魔王的目的吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000621.zh-Hant:
<voice 00861_29000621><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>你們去巡視冷達西亞，
找出異變並解決遇到的事件，
應該就能打探大魔王的目的吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53389.en:
<voice 00891_00053389><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>At the same time, it will even change this world's
destiny. At times when fate has altered, the Pendulum's
power should guide you to greater variations of fate.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53389.ja:
<voice 00891_00053389><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「同時にそれは　この世界の運命をも変えてゆく。
　運命が変わった時　振り子はチカラを得て
　より大きな運命の変異を　うながすはずだ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53389.ko:
<voice 00891_00053389><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 동시에 그게 이 세계의 운명을 바꿔 놓을 거다.
　운명이 바뀌면 진자가 힘을 얻어
　더 큰 운명의 변이를 촉발하지.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53389.zh-Hans:
<voice 00891_00053389><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>同时这也将改变世界的命运。
命运改变之时，钟摆就会获得力量，
也会催生更大的命运转折。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53389.zh-Hant:
<voice 00891_00053389><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>同時，這世界的命運也會被改變。
命運變化時，鐘擺獲得力量，
就能促進更強大的命運產生變異。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53390.en:
<voice 00931_00053390><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>When filled with the power of fate, the Pendulum will
shine. First, go to Melsandy, Celed, and Arahaghiro;
3 places with strange phenomena investigations.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53390.ja:
<voice 00931_00053390><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「運命のチカラで満ちれば　振り子は輝きを放つ。
　まずは　メルサンディ　セレド　アラハギーロの
　３箇所をめぐり　異変の調査をしてきてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53390.ko:
<voice 00931_00053390><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 운명의 힘이 충만해지면 진지가 빛날 거다.
　우선 메르상디, 셀레도, 아라하길로
　이 3곳을 돌며 이변을 조사해 다오.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53390.zh-Hans:
<voice 00931_00053390><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>钟摆一旦充满命运的力量，便会释放光辉。
首先要请你去梅尔桑蒂、塞莱德、
艾拉哈奇罗３地，对异变进行调查。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53390.zh-Hant:
<voice 00931_00053390><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>只要充滿命運的力量，鐘擺就會綻放光芒。
請先去梅爾桑蒂、塞萊德、艾拉哈奇羅
這３個地方尋找異變吧。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000863.en:
<pc> received the Pendulum of Fate (Key Item)
from Sage Lushenda!<me 60>
29000863.ja:
<pc>は　賢者ルシェンダから
運命の振り子（だいじなもの）を　受け取った！<me 60>
29000863.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 현자 루셴다에게서
운명의 진자(중요한 물건)를 받았다!<me 60>
29000863.zh-Hans:
<pc>从贤者露谢妲手中
收下了命运钟摆（重要物品）！<me 60>
29000863.zh-Hant:
<pc>從賢者露仙妲手中
收下了命運鐘擺（重要物品）！<me 60>

29000622.en:
<voice 01062_29000622><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>I'm sure you two will have plenty wonderful feats to
show for and... Hmm?<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000622.ja:
<voice 01062_29000622><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「そなた達なら　すばらしい成果を見せてくれると
　期待している……うん？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000622.ko:
<voice 01062_29000622><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 그대들이라면 훌륭한 성과를 거두리라
　기대한다…… 응?<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000622.zh-Hans:
<voice 01062_29000622><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>我很期待你们展现
丰硕的成果……嗯？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000622.zh-Hant:
<voice 01062_29000622><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>我很期待你們展現
豐碩的成果……嗯？<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000623.en:
<voice 01063_29000623><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>Pardon me, Lady Lushenda, I know you are busy, but
may I have a word.<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000623.ja:
<voice 01063_29000623><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>「お話中　失礼します。
　ルシェンダさま　よろしいですか？<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000623.ko:
<voice 01063_29000623><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>: 이야기 중에 죄송합니다.
　루셴다 님, 잠시 괜찮으십니까?<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000623.zh-Hans:
<voice 01063_29000623><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>对不起，打扰你们说话。
露谢妲大人，请问现在方便吗？<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000623.zh-Hant:
<voice 01063_29000623><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>對不起，打擾你們說話。
露仙妲大人，請問現在方便嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000624.en: <voice 01064_29000624><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>I don't mind, we're just finishing up here.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000624.ja: <voice 01064_29000624><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「かまわんよ。もう　終わったところだ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000624.ko: <voice 01064_29000624><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 상관없다. 마침 끝난 참이니까.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000624.zh-Hans: <voice 01064_29000624><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>没关系，我刚好讲完了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000624.zh-Hant: <voice 01064_29000624><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>沒關係，我剛好講完了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000625.en: <voice 01065_29000625><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>...Is that Milt, by any chance...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000625.ja:
<voice 01065_29000625><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……ひょっとして
　ミルトさん……ですか？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000625.ko:
<voice 01065_29000625><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ……혹시
　미르토 씨……인가요?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000625.zh-Hans:
<voice 01065_29000625><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……你该不会是
密鲁特……吧？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000625.zh-Hant:
<voice 01065_29000625><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……你該不會是
密爾特……吧？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000626.en:
<voice 01066_29000626><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Aah, Anlucia, you have not seen him since the battle
against the Great Demon King's Army.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000626.ja:
<voice 01066_29000626><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「ああ　アンルシアは
　先の魔王軍との　戦い以来だったな。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000626.ko:
<voice 01066_29000626><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 아, 안루시아는
　지난 마왕군과의 싸움 이후 처음 보겠군.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000626.zh-Hans:
<voice 01066_29000626><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>对了，和之前的魔王军战斗后，
安露西雅就没见过他了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000626.zh-Hant:
<voice 01066_29000626><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>對了，與之前的魔王軍戰鬥後，
安露西亞就都沒見過他了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000627.en:
<voice 01067_29000627><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Allow me to introduce you all. His name is Milt.
Once a squire of Anlucia's brother, Toma...<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000627.ja:
<voice 01067_29000627><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「紹介しよう。彼の名はミルト。
　私の従者で　アンルシアの兄であった
　トーマの……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000627.ko:
<voice 01067_29000627><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 소개하지. 이 친구는 미르토.
　내 시종이자 안루시아의 오빠인
　토마의……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000627.zh-Hans:
<voice 01067_29000627><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>我来介绍。他叫密鲁特，
是我的侍从，也是安露西雅哥哥
托玛的……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000627.zh-Hant:
<voice 01067_29000627><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>我來介紹。他叫密爾特，
是我的侍從，也是安露西亞哥哥
托瑪的……<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000628.en:
<voice 01068_29000628><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>Lady Lushenda, I apologize, but I must speak with
you urgently. It's about the secret meeting room.<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000628.ja:
<voice 01068_29000628><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>「ルシェンダさま　申し訳ありませんが
　急ぎ　お話ししたいことが。
　秘密会議室の件です。<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000628.ko:
<voice 01068_29000628><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>: 루셴다 님, 죄송하지만
　급히 말씀드릴 일이 있습니다.
　비밀 회의실 문제입니다.<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000628.zh-Hans:
<voice 01068_29000628><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>露谢妲大人，对不起，
我有急事相秉。
是秘密会议室的事。<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000628.zh-Hant:
<voice 01068_29000628><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>露仙妲大人，對不起，
我有急事相秉。
是祕密會議室的事。<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000629.en: <voice 01069_29000629><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Hmm... <pc>, Anlucia, if you will excuse me.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000629.ja:
<voice 01069_29000629><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「ふむ。
　……<pc>　アンルシア
　すまないが　失礼させてもらう。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000629.ko:
<voice 01069_29000629><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 흠.
　……<pc>, 안루시아.
　미안하지만 난 이만 실례하마.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000629.zh-Hans:
<voice 01069_29000629><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯，
……<pc>、安露西雅，
抱歉，我先离开了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000629.zh-Hant:
<voice 01069_29000629><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>嗯，
……<pc>、安露西亞，
抱歉，我先離開了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000630.en:
<voice 01070_29000630><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Please keep up the good work with strange phenomena
investigations.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000630.ja:
<voice 01070_29000630><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>「異変の調査の件
　くれぐれも　よろしく頼むぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000630.ko:
<voice 01070_29000630><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>: 이변 조사
　모쪼록 잘 부탁한다.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000630.zh-Hans:
<voice 01070_29000630><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>调查异变的事，
就拜托你们了。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000630.zh-Hant:
<voice 01070_29000630><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>調查異變的事，
就拜託你們囉。<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000631.en:
<voice 01071_29000631><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>Princess Anlucia, I know you are trying your hardest,
but if the Great Demon King is not defeated soon I...<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000631.ja:
<voice 01071_29000631><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>「アンルシア姫　せいぜい　はげまれることです。
　早く　大魔王を倒さなければ
　私は　あなたを……。<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000631.ko:
<voice 01071_29000631><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>: 안루시아 공주님, 부디 최선을 다하시길.
　한시라도 빨리 대마왕을 쓰러뜨리지 않으면
　전 당신을…….<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000631.zh-Hans:
<voice 01071_29000631><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>安露西雅公主，你好好加油吧。
如果你不快点打倒大魔王，
我会把你……<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000631.zh-Hant:
<voice 01071_29000631><start_lip_sync n02208 _normal m00001>安露西亞公主，妳好好加油吧。
如果妳不快點打倒大魔王，
我會把妳……<stop_lip_animation n02208 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000634.en:
<voice 00001_29000634><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>, I'm sorry, but would it be okay if we
stopped by my brother's room before we leave?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000634.ja:
<voice 00001_29000634><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<pc>。
　悪いのだけれど　旅立つ前に
　兄の部屋に　寄ってもいいかしら？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000634.ko:
<voice 00001_29000634><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　미안하지만 출발하기 전에
　오라버니의 방에 들러도 될까?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000634.zh-Hans:
<voice 00001_29000634><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>，
抱歉，启程前
我可以去兄长的房间吗？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000634.zh-Hant:
<voice 00001_29000634><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>，
抱歉，啟程前
我可以去哥哥的房間嗎？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000635.en: <voice 00002_29000635><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>...For a long time, I had forgotten about my brother.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000635.ja:
<voice 00002_29000635><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……長いこと
　兄のことを　忘れていたので。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000635.ko:
<voice 00002_29000635><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ……오랫동안
　오라버니를 잊고 있었으니까.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000635.zh-Hans:
<voice 00002_29000635><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……因为我已经
把兄长忘了很久了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000635.zh-Hant:
<voice 00002_29000635><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……因為我已經
把哥哥忘了很久了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53394.en:
<voice 00625_00053394><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>This is my brother's room... He was always busy and
didn't spend much time here, but... Being here does
bring back memories.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53394.ja:
<voice 00625_00053394><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ここは　兄の部屋なの……。
　忙しくて　あまり部屋にいない人だったけど
　ここにいると　いろんなことが思いだされるわ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53394.ko:
<voice 00625_00053394><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 여긴 오라버니의 방이야…….
　바빠서 방을 비우는 일이 잦은 사람이었지만
　여기 있으면 여러 추억이 떠올라.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53394.zh-Hans:
<voice 00625_00053394><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>这里是兄长的房间……
虽然他很忙，常常不在房间里，
但在这里我还是会不禁回想起很多事。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53394.zh-Hant:
<voice 00625_00053394><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>這裡是兄長的房間……
兄長很忙，不常待在房間，
但我只要待在這裡，就能想起很多事。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53395.ja: <voice 00750_00053395><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……大丈夫よ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53395.zh-Hant: <voice 00750_00053395><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不要緊的……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53396.en:
<voice 00815_00053396><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I couldn't attend my brother's funeral, but I did get a
chance to say goodbye to him in the world of my
memories.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53396.ja:
<voice 00815_00053396><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「兄の葬儀には　出席できなかったけど
　私は　自分の記憶の世界で
　ちゃんと　兄とお別れしたから。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53396.ko:
<voice 00815_00053396><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 오라버니의 장례식에는 참석하지 못했지만
　난 내 기억 속 세계에서
　오라버니와 작별 인사를 나눴으니까.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53396.zh-Hans:
<voice 00815_00053396><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>虽然没能出席兄长的葬礼，
但是我在自己的记忆世界里
已经和兄长好好道别过了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53396.zh-Hant:
<voice 00815_00053396><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我雖然沒出席兄長的葬禮，
但我在自己的記憶世界裡，
好好地和兄長道別了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000636.en:
<voice 00860_29000636><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Now my reason for being is to complete the Hero's
duty, for my brother's sake!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000636.ja:
<voice 00860_29000636><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「今は　私のために生きてくれた　兄の分まで
　しっかり　勇者の使命を　果たさなくっちゃ！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000636.ko:
<voice 00860_29000636><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이제 날 위해 살았던 오라버니 몫까지
　최선을 다해 용사의 사명을 완수할 거야!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000636.zh-Hans:
<voice 00860_29000636><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我得好好尽勇者的使命，
才对得起为我而活的兄长！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000636.zh-Hant:
<voice 00860_29000636><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我得好好盡勇者的使命，
才對得起為我而活的哥哥！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000637.en:
<voice 01085_29000637><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>, you can keep this. I have no more need
of it, seeing as how we're back in True Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000637.ja:
<voice 01085_29000637><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<pc>
　これは　あなたが預かっておいて。
　真の世界に戻れた以上　私にはもう必要ない。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000637.ko:
<voice 01085_29000637><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 이건 네가 갖고 있어 줘.
　진짜 세계로 돌아왔으니
　이제 내겐 필요 없어.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000637.zh-Hans:
<voice 01085_29000637><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>，
这个由你来保管。
既然能回到真正的世界，我就不需要这个了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000637.zh-Hant:
<voice 01085_29000637><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>，
這個由你來保管。
既然能回到真實世界，我就不需要這個了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53430.ja:
<pc>は
ブレイブストーン（だいじなもの）を
受け取った！<me 61>
53430.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
勇气之石（重要物品）！<me 61>
53430.zh-Hant:
<pc>
收下了
勇氣之石（重要物品）！<me 61>

53400.en:
<voice 01420_00053400><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>That stone will surely be useful in our future travels, at
times when we need to return to False Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53400.ja:
<voice 01420_00053400><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「偽りのレンダーシアから　戻る時に使った
　その石は　きっと
　これからの旅に　役立つわ！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53400.ko:
<voice 01420_00053400><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 가짜 렌더시아에서 돌아올 때 쓴
　이 돌은 앞으로도
　우리의 여행에 큰 도움이 될 거야!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53400.zh-Hans:
<voice 01420_00053400><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>从伪冷达西亚回来时使用到的
这块石头，一定会对
今后的旅行有所帮助！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53400.zh-Hant:
<voice 01420_00053400><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>從偽冷達西亞回來時
使用的那個石頭，
一定會對你接下來的旅程有幫助的！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000638.en:
<voice 01421_29000638><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Princess Anlucia, <pc>, are you leaving
already?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000638.ja:
<voice 01421_29000638><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「アンルシア姫　<pc>さん
　もう　お出かけになりますか？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000638.ko:
<voice 01421_29000638><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 안루시아 공주님, <pc> 씨.
　벌써 출발하시는 겁니까?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000638.zh-Hans:
<voice 01421_29000638><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>安露西雅公主、<pc>，
你们要外出了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000638.zh-Hant:
<voice 01421_29000638><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>安露西亞公主、<pc>，
你們要外出了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000639.en:
<voice 01505_29000639><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Hmm... So <pc> has the Brave Stone. If that's
the case, a little explanation is needed, don't you
agree.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000639.ja:
<voice 01505_29000639><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ふむ……。<pc>さんが
　ブレイブストーンを　持つんですか。
　それなら　すこし説明が必要ですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000639.ko:
<voice 01505_29000639><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 흠……. 브레이브 스톤을
　<pc> 씨께 주셨군요.
　그렇다면 조금 설명이 필요하겠네요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000639.zh-Hans:
<voice 01505_29000639><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>嗯……<pc>要带着
勇气之石吗？
那就需要稍微说明一下了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000639.zh-Hant:
<voice 01505_29000639><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>嗯……<pc>要帶著
勇氣之石嗎？
那就需要稍微說明一下了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000640.en:
<voice 01505_29000640><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Hmm... So <pc> has the Brave Stone. If that's
the case, a little explanation is needed, don't you
agree.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000640.ja:
<voice 01505_29000640><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ふむ……。<pc>さんが
　ブレイブストーンを　持つんですか。
　それなら　すこし説明が必要ですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000640.ko:
<voice 01505_29000640><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 흠……. 브레이브 스톤을
　<pc> 씨께 주셨군요.
　그렇다면 조금 설명이 필요하겠네요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000640.zh-Hans:
<voice 01505_29000640><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>嗯……<pc>要带着
勇气之石吗？
那就需要稍微说明一下了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000640.zh-Hant:
<voice 01505_29000640><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>嗯……<pc>要帶著
勇氣之石嗎？
那就需要稍微說明一下了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53402.en:
<voice 01640_00053402><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Crows! Where have you been until now? You didn't
even attend the banquet...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53402.ja:
<voice 01640_00053402><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「クロウズさん！
　今まで　どこに行ってたんですか？
　宴にも出席しないで……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53402.ko:
<voice 01640_00053402><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 크로우즈 씨!
　지금까지 어디 계셨던 거예요?
　연회 때도 안 보이시더니…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53402.zh-Hans:
<voice 01640_00053402><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>库洛乌兹！
你之前去哪里了？
连宴会也没有出席……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53402.zh-Hant:
<voice 01640_00053402><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>庫洛茲！
你去哪了？
宴會也沒出席……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53403.en:
<voice 01715_00053403><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...Heheh. Formal gatherings like that aren't my cup
of tea, so I snuck out and did a little tour of
the castle.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53403.ja:
<voice 01715_00053403><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「……ふふっ。
　ああいう　かしこまった席は　苦手なので
　こっそり抜け出して　お城を見学していました。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53403.ko:
<voice 01715_00053403><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: ……후후.
　그런 딱딱한 자리는 영 불편해서
　몰래 빠져나와 성안을 둘러보고 있었습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53403.zh-Hans:
<voice 01715_00053403><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……呵呵。
我不喜欢那种正式的宴会，
所以悄悄溜出去，参观城堡了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53403.zh-Hant:
<voice 01715_00053403><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……呵呵，
我不擅長那種正式場合，
就悄悄溜走，去看看市鎮了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000641.en:
<voice 01770_29000641><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>The Brave Stone, if used by the Hero, is something
that allows for one to freely to travel between the
two worlds.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000641.ja:
<voice 01770_29000641><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ブレイブストーンは勇者が使えば
　自由に　ふたつの世界を行き来できるもの。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000641.ko:
<voice 01770_29000641><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 브레이브 스톤은 용사가 사용해야만
　두 세계를 자유로이 오갈 수 있는 물건이니……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000641.zh-Hans:
<voice 01770_29000641><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>只要是勇者使用勇气之石，
就能自由往来两个世界。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000641.zh-Hant:
<voice 01770_29000641><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>只要是勇者使用勇氣之石，
就能自由往來兩個世界。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53405.en:
<voice 01860_00053405><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Even if <pc> uses it, I'm certain nothing
would occur, I believe. However...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53405.ja:
<voice 01860_00053405><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんが使っても
　きっと　何も起こらないと思いますよ。
　ただし……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53405.ko:
<voice 01860_00053405><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨가 사용해도
　아무 일도 일어나지 않을 겁니다.
　하지만……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53405.zh-Hans:
<voice 01860_00053405><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>由<pc>你来使用的话，
就不会有任何效果了。
不过……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53405.zh-Hant:
<voice 01860_00053405><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>即使<pc>用了，
我想也不會發生什麼。
不過……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53406.en:
<voice 01910_00053406><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>At the entrace to Gran Zedora's Castletown, the
pentagonal pillar with the wings grown at the top...
The Brave Stone Pillar, you're aware of it, yes?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53406.ja:
<voice 01910_00053406><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「このグランゼドーラの　城下町の入り口にもある
　てっぺんに翼を生やした　五角形の柱……
　勇気の石塔を　ご存知ですか？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53406.ko:
<voice 01910_00053406><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그랑제도라 시가지 입구에 있는
　꼭대기에 날개가 달린 오각형 기둥……
　용기의 석탑을 아십니까?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53406.zh-Hans:
<voice 01910_00053406><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你知道勇气石塔吗？
就是位于古兰泽朵拉城区的入口处，
顶部生有双翼的五角形柱子……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53406.zh-Hant:
<voice 01910_00053406><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你知道古蘭澤朵拉城鎮入口那個
頂上有翅膀的五角形石柱……
勇氣石塔嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53407.en:
<voice 02040_00053407><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>There's not many left that know of it, however it was
built by an ancient hero to protect these lands, and
infused with the Hero's power.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53407.ja:
<voice 02040_00053407><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「あまり知られていないことですが
　あれは　いにしえの勇者が　その地を守るために
　勇者のチカラを込めて作った　石塔なのです。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53407.ko:
<voice 02040_00053407><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 잘 알려지진 않았지만
　그건 고대의 용사가 그 땅을 지키기 위해
　용사의 힘을 불어넣은 만든 석탑입니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53407.zh-Hans:
<voice 02040_00053407><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>虽然很少有人知道，
但那是古代的勇者为了保护那里
注入勇者之力而制作的石塔。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53407.zh-Hant:
<voice 02040_00053407><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>雖然很少人知道，
但那是自古以來勇者為了守護這片土地，
將勇者的力量注入裡面的石塔。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53408.en:
<voice 02180_00053408><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>If you hold the Brave Stone and examine the stone
pillar, perhaps the Hero's power will allow you to
connect the true and false worlds, don't you agree.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53408.ja:
<voice 02180_00053408><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ブレイブストーンを持って　その石塔を調べれば
　勇者のチカラが手助けしてくれ　真の世界と
　偽りの世界を　結んでくれるかもしれませんね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53408.ko:
<voice 02180_00053408><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 브레이브 스톤을 소지한 채 그 석탑을 조사하면
　용사의 힘의 도움을 받아 진짜 세계와
　가짜 세계를 오갈 수 있을지도 모릅니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53408.zh-Hans:
<voice 02180_00053408><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>如果你带着勇气之石调查勇气石塔，
也许勇者之力会助你将真实世界
和虚假世界连接在一起。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53408.zh-Hant:
<voice 02180_00053408><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>拿著勇氣之石去調查那個石塔，
勇者的力量也許會幫你
連結真實與虛偽世界。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53409.en:
<voice 02280_00053409><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Now... Since <pc>'s face is all cheerful now,
I think I will leave the castle now to pursue my own
goals.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53409.ja:
<voice 02280_00053409><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「さて……。<pc>さんの　元気な顔も
　見られましたし　私も　この城を出て
　自分の目的を　果たしにいくとしましょうか。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53409.ko:
<voice 02280_00053409><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그럼……. <pc> 씨의
　얼굴도 봤으니 저도 이 성을 떠나
　제 목적을 이루러 가야겠군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53409.zh-Hans:
<voice 02280_00053409><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那么……既然已经见到<pc>
充满活力的样子了，我也该离开城堡，
去达成自己的目的了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53409.zh-Hant:
<voice 02280_00053409><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那麼……<pc>，你也恢復精神了，
我就離開這座城，
去做我想做的事了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53410.en:
<voice 02350_00053410><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>The great task of bringing Anlucia back to this world
is over, but there is still much work to be done...
Until we meet again.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53410.ja:
<voice 02350_00053410><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「アンルシア姫を　この世界に戻すという
　大仕事は終わりましたが　まだ　やるべきことは
　たくさんあるのでね……。それでは　また。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53410.ko:
<voice 02350_00053410><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 안루시아 공주님을 이 세계로 데려온다는
　큰 산은 넘었지만 아직 해야 할 일이
　많이 남았거든요……. 그럼 다음에 또 뵙죠.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53410.zh-Hans:
<voice 02350_00053410><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>虽然我已经完成了将安露西雅公主
送回这个世界这项大工程，
但是我要做的事还很多……那就再见了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53410.zh-Hant:
<voice 02350_00053410><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>雖然完成了
送安露西亞公主回到這世界的重要任務，
但要做的事情還有很多……那麼，再會了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53411.en: <voice 02610_00053411><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>What a mysterious man that Crows is...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53411.ja: <voice 02610_00053411><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「不思議な人ね　クロウズさんって……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53411.ko: <voice 02610_00053411><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 크로우즈 씨는 정말 신비한 사람이네…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53411.zh-Hans: <voice 02610_00053411><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>库洛乌兹真是个不可思议的人啊……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53411.zh-Hant: <voice 02610_00053411><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>庫洛茲真是不可思議的人……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000642.en:
<voice 02611_29000642><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>That's right, <pc>, you can register my room
as a Zoomstone location.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000642.ja:
<voice 02611_29000642><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「そうだ　<pc>。
　ルーラストーンに　私の部屋を登録しましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000642.ko:
<voice 02611_29000642><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 참, <pc>.
　루라 스톤에 내 방을 등록해 두자.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000642.zh-Hans:
<voice 02611_29000642><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>对了，<pc>，
将我的房间登记至鲁拉之石吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000642.zh-Hant:
<voice 02611_29000642><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>對了，<pc>，
將我的房間登錄到魯拉石吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000644.en:
<voice 02855_29000644><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I asked Lushenda to allow you come directly to my
room.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000644.ja:
<voice 02855_29000644><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ルシェンダさまに　直接　私の部屋に
　来ることができるように　調整をお願いしたの。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000644.ko:
<voice 02855_29000644><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 바로 내 방으로 올 수 있도록
　루셴다 님께 조정을 부탁드렸어.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000644.zh-Hans:
<voice 02855_29000644><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我拜托露谢妲大人，将我的房间
调整成可以直接过来。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000644.zh-Hant:
<voice 02855_29000644><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我拜託露仙妲大人，將我的房間
調整成可以直接過來。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000643.en:
<voice 02715_29000643><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>If we find any strange phenomena, I want to return to
the castle and report it to Lushenda at once.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000643.ja:
<voice 02715_29000643><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「この世界の異変を調べて　何かわかったら
　すぐ　この城に戻って　ルシェンダさまに
　知らせないと　いけないと思うから。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000643.ko:
<voice 02715_29000643><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이 세계의 이변을 조사하다 뭔가 알아내면
　바로 성으로 돌아와 루셴다 님께
　보고드려야 하니까.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000643.zh-Hans:
<voice 02715_29000643><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>因为去调查这世界的异变，
要是有什么发现，就必须马上回城，
向露谢妲大人报告。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000643.zh-Hant:
<voice 02715_29000643><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>因為去調查這世界的異變，
要是有什麼發現，就必須馬上回城，
向露仙妲大人報告。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000645.en:
<pc> registered the Hero Princess' room
as a Zoomstone location!
29000645.ja:
<pc>は
勇者姫の部屋を登録した！
29000645.zh-Hans:
<pc>
登记了勇者公主的房间！
29000645.zh-Hant:
<pc>
登錄了勇者公主的房間！

29000646.en: <voice 03035_29000646><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Now then, let's go!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000646.ja: <voice 03035_29000646><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「じゃあ　行きましょ！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000646.ko: <voice 03035_29000646><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그럼 가자!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000646.zh-Hans: <voice 03035_29000646><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那我们走吧！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000646.zh-Hant: <voice 03035_29000646><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那我們走吧！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
